comments:
If I correlate large logs, the correlation happens in the background (which is 
good) and takes a long time. If, in the meantime, I try to open the log 
interactions, I get an exception:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

(BasicEList.java(Inlined Compiled Code))

(Compiled Code))
